# .github Folder – Rules & Tools

This folder contains templates & workflows that guide how work is tracked & delivered in this project.

## What's Inside
- **Issue Templates** – Pre-made forms for bug reports, feature requests, & documentation updates.
- **Pull Request Template** – A checklist & guide for submitting changes.
- **Workflows** – GitHub Actions to help maintain quality.

These tools make sure communication stays consistent, & nothing important is missed.
